definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
to immobilize with a lasso/to be trapped in the stock market
lit. to mend the pen after sheep are lost (idiom)/fig. to act belatedly/better late than never/to lock the stable door after the horse has bolted
cage/trap (e.g. basket, pit or snare for catching animals)/fig. bonds (of wrong ideas)/shackles (of past misconceptions)/to trap/to shackle

sentences.english: This article introduces dyeing of polyamide-66 with brilliant fast reactive dyes.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了錦綸66用豔麗牢活性染料染色的方法。

sentences.english: He regained his freedom after ten years' imprison-ment.
sentences.chinese: 坐了10年牢以後，他重新獲得了自由。

sentences.english: I was in prision and you came to Me.
The judge will put him behind bars for at leas four years.
sentences.chinese: 法官最低限度也會判他坐四年牢。

sentences.english: The prisoners were left to rot in prison.
sentences.chinese: 那些囚犯被留置在牢中任其消瘦。

sentences.english: The knaves who set fire to the barn have been caught and sent to the prison.
sentences.chinese: 縱火燒穀倉的騙子被抓起來送到牢裏去了。

sentences.english: Nor would she want me to barter her self-image for a few years in prison.
sentences.chinese: 她也不想要我去爲她坐幾年的牢而換取她的自我形象。

sentences.english: How long does Cally spend in the brig for shooting Sharon?
sentences.chinese: 由於射殺了沙倫，凱莉在牢裏呆了多久？

sentences.english: Translation by Thenardier: A comrade of the galleys.
sentences.chinese: 據德納第推測，“是個同坐苦役牢的夥伴了”。

sentences.english: Like"I will go to jail for the rest of my life for showing you"classified.
sentences.chinese: 是那種要是我給你看了就得做一輩子牢的機密。

sentences.english: Even though in the prison, he tried to persuade the jailer to rebel!
sentences.chinese: 關在牢裏，還要勸牢頭造反。

sentences.english: The lid keeps coming off, can you fix it on?
sentences.chinese: 蓋子老要掉下來，你能把它蓋牢嗎？

sentences.english: He is sent to prison for forgery .
Or maybe longer than that if you can keep your web wound tight around him.
sentences.chinese: 甚至還不止，只要你的羅網把小主公套得更牢一點。

sentences.english: We mustn't hold against him that he has been in prison.
sentences.chinese: 我們不要因爲他過去坐過牢而對他有偏見。

definition: to gather together/to investigate/to entangle/to correct
to break the law/to commit a crime
